tool_description: API that echoes requests back to the sender
title: Echo

api_list.name: Send simple GET request
api_list.description: This endpoint gives back simple 200 Ok response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://echo19.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "echo19.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Send data
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to send data to be echoed back.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://echo19.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "echo19.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://echo19.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "echo19.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
